song_name: See You When I See You
lyrics:
7 contributorssee you when i see you lyricsverse 1
lets dont say goodbye
i hate the way it sounds
so if you dont mind
lets just say for now

chorus
see you when i see you
another place some other time
if i ever get down your way
or youre ever up around mine
well laugh about the old days
and catch up on the new
yeah see you when i see you
and i hope its some day soon

verse 2
god made this old world round
and maybe its that way
so that paths that we go down
yeah will cross again someday
and someday ill

chorus
see you when i see you
another place some other time
if i ever get down your way
or youre ever up around mine
well laugh about the old days
and catch up on the new
yeah see you when i see you
and i hope its some day real soon
and i hope its some day soon
see jason aldean liveget tickets as low as 41you might also likechorus
see you when i see you
another place some other time
if i ever get down your way
if youre ever up around mine  just stop by
well laugh about the old days
and catch up on the new

and i hope its some day soon
